public class MainActivity extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
MainActivity serves as the central hub of the Matata app, displaying a list of events, allowing users to navigate to different sections, and managing notifications. This activity initializes a user profile in Firestore if it does not already exist, handles event-related actions, and manages user permissions for notifications.

  • Method Details

    • onCreate

      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Called when the activity is first created. Initializes the user profile in Firestore if necessary, sets up UI components, handles notification permissions, and loads event data.
      Overrides:
      onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
      Parameters:
      savedInstanceState - Bundle containing the activity's previously saved state, if any.

    • showFrozenDialog

      private void showFrozenDialog()
      Displays a frozen dialog when the user's account is marked as frozen.

    • initializeEntrantApp

      private void initializeEntrantApp()
      Initializes the app in entrant mode, which hides admin-specific features. Configures notifications and loads event data for the user.

    • initializeApp

      private void initializeApp()
      Initializes the app with admin features, configuring notifications and loading event data.

    • initializeUI

      private void initializeUI()
      Sets up the UI components, including the RecyclerView for displaying events.

    • setOnClickListeners

      private void setOnClickListeners()
      Sets up click listeners for various UI elements, such as profile navigation, adding events, QR scanner, and exploring events on the map.

    • addEventsInit

      private void addEventsInit()
      Loads and listens for changes to event data in Firestore. Updates the RecyclerView dynamically when data changes.

    • retrieveWaitlistAndNotify

      private void retrieveWaitlistAndNotify()
      Retrieves the waitlist for events organized by the user and sends notifications to the waitlisted users.
